Public NotInheritable Class EntityConnection Inherits DbConnection
public ref class EntityConnection sealed : System::Data::Common::DbConnection

summary.span: 包含概念模型的參考和資料來源連接。

span.span: Contains a reference to a conceptual model and a data source connection.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心讓類似 和 等物件與其中繼資料未同步， 必須鎖定它的中繼資料。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 當鎖定中繼資料以後，就不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 以下是鎖定中繼資料的兩個案例：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 透過預設建構函式 (Constructor) 或 建構函式 (可接受連接字串) 來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一種情況下，連接字串都可能會在開啟連接之前變更多次。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 呼叫 或 會鎖定中繼資料。Calling or locks the metadata. - 透過可接受 和 的 建構函式來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在此情況下，中繼資料會在建構時鎖定。In this case, the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 當載入中繼資料時， 會驗證概念模型、儲存模型及對應檔是否都存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱[使用 EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心讓類似 和 等物件與其中繼資料未同步， 必須鎖定它的中繼資料。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 當鎖定中繼資料以後，就不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 以下是鎖定中繼資料的兩個案例：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 透過預設建構函式 (Constructor) 或 建構函式 (可接受連接字串) 來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一種情況下，連接字串都可能會在開啟連接之前變更多次。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 呼叫 或 會鎖定中繼資料。Calling or locks the metadata. - 透過可接受 和 的 建構函式來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在此情況下，中繼資料會在建構時鎖定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 當載入中繼資料時， 會驗證概念模型、儲存模型及對應檔是否都存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱[使用 EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生應用程式的組態檔中儲存的具名的連接字串中。The generate a named connection string that is stored in the application's configuration file. 這個具名的連接字串可以提供取代`connectionString`參數，當您具現化類別。This named connection string can be supplied in place of the `connectionString` parameter when you instantiate the class. 若要避免不小心讓 和 物件與其中繼資料未同步， 必須鎖定它的中繼資料。To avoid inadvertently putting objects and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 當鎖定中繼資料以後，就不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 以下是鎖定中繼資料的兩個案例：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 透過預設建構函式或是可接受連接字串的這個建構函式 () 來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through this constructor (), which accepts a connection string. 在任何一種情況下，連接字串都可能會在開啟連接之前變更多次。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 呼叫 或 會鎖定中繼資料。Calling or locks the metadata. - 透過可接受 和 的 建構函式來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在此情況下，中繼資料會在建構時鎖定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 當載入中繼資料時， 會驗證概念模型、儲存模型及對應檔是否都存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱[使用 EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此建構函式可讓您從不是檔案或磁碟內的中繼資料或是從組件 (Assembly) 內的內嵌資源來建立 。This constructor enables you to create an from metadata that is not from a file on a disk or from an embedded resource in an assembly. 若要避免不小心讓類似 和 等物件與其中繼資料未同步， 必須鎖定它的中繼資料。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, the must lock its metadata. 當鎖定中繼資料以後，就不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 以下是鎖定中繼資料的兩個案例：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 透過預設建構函式 (Constructor) 或 建構函式 (可接受連接字串) 來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一種情況下，連接字串都可能會在開啟連接之前變更多次。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 呼叫 或 會鎖定中繼資料。Calling or locks the metadata. - 透過可接受 和 的這個建構函式 () 來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through this constructor (), which accepts a and a . 在此情況下，中繼資料會在建構時鎖定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 當載入中繼資料時， 會驗證概念模型、儲存模型及對應檔是否都存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.

summary.span: 使用基礎提供者開始異動。

span.span: Begins a transaction by using the underlying provider.
A new .

returns.span: 傳回的 執行個體可以在之後與 產生關聯，以便在該交易之下執行命令。

span.span: The returned instance can later be associated with the to execute the command under that transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用 交易隔離等級。The method uses the transaction isolation level. 若要指定不同的隔離等級，請呼叫 。To specify a different isolation level, call . 不同基礎提供者可能會以不同方式解譯這個值。This value might be interpreted differently by different underlying providers. 如果您希望可以在多個提供者之間移植應用程式，應該呼叫 來明確指定交易隔離等級。If you want your application to be portable across multiple providers, it should explicitly specify the transaction isolation level by calling . 在任何特定時刻，都不能有一個以上的使用中交易是透過 所建立。At any particular moment there can be no more than one active transaction that was created through . 嘗試在具有目前交易結果的 上呼叫任何一個 多載會產生 。An attempt to call any of the overloads on an that already has a current transaction results in an .

span.span: The underlying provider is not known.
-or-

-or-
The state of the is not .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉與資料庫的連接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當基礎資料提供者未知時， 的呼叫不會進行任何作業。If the underlying data provider is not known, the call to does nothing.

span.span: An error occurred when closing the connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ConnectionString { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property ConnectionString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 連接字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the connection string.

value.span: 建立資料來源之初始連接所需的連接字串。

span.span: The connection string required to establish the initial connection to a data source.
The default value is an empty string.

value.span: 在關閉的連接上會傳回目前設定的值。

span.span: On a closed connection, the currently set value is returned.

value.span: 如果沒有設定值，則傳回空字串。

span.span: If no value has been set, an empty string is returned.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `EntityClient`連接字串是由以分號隔開的關鍵字/值參數組的序列所組成。An `EntityClient` connection string consists of a sequence of keyword/value parameter pairs separated by semicolons. 等號 (=) 會連接每個關鍵字和其值。The equals sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 下表列出 中關鍵字值的有效名稱。The following table lists the valid names for keyword values in the . |關鍵字Keyword|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`Provider`|如果沒有指定 `Name` 關鍵字，就是必要項。Required if the `Name` keyword is not specified. 用來擷取基礎提供者之 物件的提供者名稱。The provider name, which is used to retrieve the object for the underlying provider. 這個值是常數。This value is constant.

當`Name`關鍵字未包含在連接字串的非空白值`Provider`關鍵字是必要項。When the `Name` keyword is not included in the connection string, a non-empty value for the `Provider` keyword is required. 此關鍵字與 `Name` 關鍵字互斥。This keyword is mutually exclusive with the `Name` keyword.| |`Provider Connection String`|選擇性。Optional. 指定傳給基礎資料來源的提供者特定連接字串。Specifies the provider-specific connection string that is passed to the underlying data source. 這個連接字串會藉由使用資料提供者的有效關鍵字/值組來表示。This connection string is expressed by using valid keyword/value pairs for the data provider. 無效的 `Provider Connection String` 會在資料來源對其進行評估時導致執行階段錯誤。An invalid `Provider Connection String` will cause a run-time error when it is evaluated by the data source.

此關鍵字與 `Name` 關鍵字互斥。This keyword is mutually exclusive with the `Name` keyword.

`Provider Connection String` 的值必須以引號括住。The value of the `Provider Connection String` must be surrounded by quotes. 以下是一個範例：The following is an example:

`Provider Connection String ="Server=serverName; User ID = userID";`

下列範例無效：The following example is not going to work:

`Provider Connection String =Server=serverName; User ID = userID`| |`Metadata`|如果沒有指定 `Name` 關鍵字，就是必要項。Required if the `Name` keyword is not specified. 管線分隔的目錄、 檔案和資源，以尋找模型和對應資訊的位置清單。A pipe-delimited list of directories, files, and resource locations in which to look for model and mapping information. 以下是一個範例：The following is an example:

`Metadata=`

`c:\model | c:\model\sql\mapping.msl;`

忽略垂直線分隔符號兩端的空白。Blank spaces on each side of the pipe separator are ignored.

此關鍵字與 `Name` 關鍵字互斥。This keyword is mutually exclusive with the `Name` keyword.| |`Name`|應用程式可選擇性的在應用程式組態檔中指定連接名稱，以提供必要的關鍵字/值連接字串值。The application can optionally specify the connection name in an application configuration file that provides the required keyword/value connection string values. 在此情況下，您不能在連接字串中直接提供這些值。In this case, you cannot supply them directly in the connection string. 在組態檔中不允許 `Name` 關鍵字。The `Name` keyword is not allowed in a configuration file.

當 `Name` 關鍵字未包含在連接字串中時，需要 Provider 關鍵字的非空白值。When the `Name` keyword is not included in the connection string, a non-empty values for Provider keyword is required.

此關鍵字與所有其他連接字串關鍵字互斥。This keyword is mutually exclusive with all the other connection string keywords.| 應用程式可以提供關鍵字/值直接在屬性，也可以指定的值`Name`關鍵字。The application can supply the keyword/values directly in the property, or it can specify a value for the `Name` keyword. 如果`Name`指定關鍵字，將連接字串關鍵字/值會從擷取應用程式組態檔，如下所示：If the `Name` keyword is specified, the connection string keyword/values are retrieved from an application configuration file, as follows: `Name=AdventureWorksEntities;` 如果`Name`關鍵字用於屬性，不允許其他關鍵字。If the `Name` keyword is used in the property, other keywords are not allowed. `Name`是指儲存在具名的連接字串關鍵字`connectionStrings`區段應用程式組態檔中，如下列範例所示。The `Name` keyword refers to a named connection string that is stored in the `connectionStrings` section in an application configuration file, as shown in the following example. `Provider`， `Metadata`，和`Provider Connection String`在執行階段從組態檔擷取值。The `Provider`, `Metadata`, and `Provider Connection String` values are retrieved from the configuration file at run time. 也可以直接在 屬性中提供關鍵字/值組，如下列範例中所示。The keyword/value pairs can also be supplied directly in the property, as shown in the following example. 在此情況下，`Name`不是關鍵字。In this case, the `Name` keyword is not used. ``` "Provider=System.Data.SqlClient; Metadata=c:\metadata|c:\Metadata\Sql; Provider Connection String= 'Data Source=localhost; Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Integrated Security=True;Connection Timeout=60' " ``` 若要避免不小心讓類似 和 等物件與其中繼資料未同步， 必須鎖定它的中繼資料。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 當鎖定中繼資料以後，就不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 以下是鎖定中繼資料的兩個案例：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 透過預設建構函式 (Constructor) 或 建構函式 (可接受連接字串) 來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一種情況下，連接字串都可能會在開啟連接之前變更多次。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 呼叫 或 會鎖定中繼資料。Calling or locks the metadata. - 透過可接受 和 的 建構函式來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在此情況下，中繼資料會在建構時鎖定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 當載入中繼資料時， 會驗證概念模型、儲存模型及對應檔是否都存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何搭配 使用 。The following example demonstrates how to use the in conjunction with a . 此程式碼中設定的屬性`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`建立字串，提供基礎提供者連接字串的一部分。The code sets properties of a `SqlConnectionStringBuilder` to create a string that supplies part of the underlying provider connection string. 請注意，`Provider`名稱不能設定使用`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`，因為它不會使用有效`SqlConnection`語法。Note that the `Provider` name cannot be set by using the `SqlConnectionStringBuilder`, because it does not use valid `SqlConnection` syntax. 程式碼會建立藉由設定字串`EntityConnectionStringBuilder`屬性。The code creates the string by setting `EntityConnectionStringBuilder` properties. [!code-csharp[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/CS/Program.cs#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)] [!code-vb[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/VB/Program.vb#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 類別建立時， 也會自動建立。A is automatically created when the class is created. 此建立程序可能會擲回中繼資料特有的例外狀況。The creation process might throw metadata-specific exceptions. 中繼資料會載入記憶體中，而 Entity Data Model (EDM) 應用程式會使用該中繼資料來存取有關基礎資料來源的資訊。Metadata is loaded into memory and an Entity Data Model (EDM) application uses that metadata to access information about the underlying data source. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ADO.NET 中繼資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5)。For more information, see [ADO.NET Metadata](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5). 若要避免不小心讓類似 和 等物件與其中繼資料未同步， 必須鎖定它的中繼資料。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 當鎖定中繼資料以後，就不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 以下是鎖定中繼資料的兩個案例：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 透過預設建構函式 (Constructor) 或 建構函式 (可接受連接字串) 來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任一種情況下連接字串都可能會在開啟連接之前變更多次。In either case the connection string may be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 或鎖定中繼資料。 or locks the metadata. - 透過可接受 和 的 建構函式來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which accepts a and a . 在此情況下，中繼資料會在建構時鎖定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 當載入中繼資料時， 會驗證概念模型、儲存模型及對應檔是否都存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.

summary.span: 呼叫基礎資料提供者的 方法，建立與資料來源的連接。

span.span: Establishes a connection to the data source by calling the underlying data provider's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心讓類似 和 等物件與其中繼資料未同步， 必須鎖定它的中繼資料。To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as and out of sync with their metadata, must lock its metadata. 當鎖定中繼資料以後，就不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked. 以下是鎖定中繼資料的兩個案例：The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - 透過預設建構函式 (Constructor) 或 建構函式 (可接受連接字串) 來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the constructor, which accepts a connection string. 在任何一種情況下，連接字串都可能會在開啟連接之前變更多次。In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened. 呼叫 或 會鎖定中繼資料。Calling or locks the metadata. - 透過可接受 和 的 建構函式來建構 執行個體。The instance is constructed through the constructor, which that accepts a and a . 在此情況下，中繼資料會在建構時鎖定。In this case the metadata is locked at construction time. 不允許對連接字串做任何變更。No changes to the connection string are ever allowed. 當載入中繼資料時， 會驗證概念模型、儲存模型及對應檔是否都存在。When metadata is loaded, the verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StoreConnection As DbConnection
public: property System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ StoreConnection { System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 提供基礎資料來源連接的存取 ( 物件會使用該連接)。

span.span: Provides access to the underlying data source connection that is used by the object.
The for the data source connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果關閉 物件，將會關閉傳回的資料來源連接。If the object is closed, the returned data source connection will be closed. 如果開啟它，將會傳回開啟的資料來源連接。If it is open, an open data source connection will be returned. 如果設定了資料來源連接資訊，傳回的值一定不是 null。If the data source connection information was set, the returned value is always non-null. 如果沒有資料來源連接資訊 (例如，使用了預設建構函式而且之後未設定任何連接字串)，則會傳回 null 參考。If there is no data source connection information (for example, if the default constructor was used and no connection string was set afterwards), then a null reference is returned. Entity Framework 所使用的相同資料來源連接可以與應用程式的其他部分共用。The same data source connection used by the Entity Framework can be shared with other parts of an application. 資料來源連接會以 物件的形式從 的 屬性或是從 的 屬性傳回。The data source connection is returned as a object from the property of , or from the property of .
